channel.title: Compiler error
channel.description:
Help is greatly appreciated, i'm trying to implement highscores server-side right now, and i've recieved 2 errors from the whole thing. Could somebody please tell me what's wrong?:
[code]src\server\model\players\Highscores.java:63: error: cannot find symbol public static boolean save(Client c) { ^ symbol: class Client location: class Highscores src\server\model\players\Client.java:1065: error: cannot find symbol Highscores.save(this); ^ symbol: variable Highscores location: class Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Kasparr Kasparr
item.description:
@Kasparr wrote:

I’ve identified my Highscores.java already, the (Client c) is what seems to be giving me my error.

src\server\model\players\Highscores.java:63: error: cannot find symbol public static boolean save(Client c) { ^ symbol: class Client location: class Highscores Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Rs2-Remake Rs2-Remake
item.description:
@Rs2-Remake wrote:

You need to identify your highscores.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Kasparr Kasparr
item.description:
@Kasparr wrote:

I did what you said and it got rid of one error, however, now I have this as an error:

src\server\model\players\Highscores.java:63: error: <identifier> expected public static boolean save(c) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Rs2-Remake Rs2-Remake
item.description:
@Rs2-Remake wrote:

I had this problem… try either changing the “Client” part to “client” instead. lowercase. if that doesn’t work… try just using “c” and not the “client” part.

Read full topic
